attrs.script:
$source = "https://downloads.arcserve.com/arcserve_family_products/NU7_test/Arcserve_Unified_Data_Protection.exe"
$Filename = [System.IO.Path]::GetFileName($source)
$dest = "C:\Users\"+$env:Username+"\Downloads\" + $Filename
$comptername = @@{address}@@

$wc = New-Object System.Net.WebClient
$wc.DownloadFile($source, $dest)
New-SmbShare -Name "Share" -Path "C:\Users\Administrator\Downloads" -FullAccess "Administrator"
New-PSDrive -Name "S" -Root "\\$comptername\Users\Administrator\Downloads" -Persist -PSProvider "FileSystem"
Get-PSDrive -Name "S"
Write-Output "Installaing"
S:\Arcserve_Unified_Data_Protection.exe -s -a -q -Products:All -User:$env:Username -Password:"nutanix/4u"
Write-Output "Installed"

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create
